trans-unit.source: Setting date ranges in Business Central | Microsoft Docs

seg-source.mrk: Setting date ranges in Business Central | Microsoft Docs

target.mrk: Nastavení rozsahu dat v Business Central | Microsoft Docs

trans-unit.source: Learn about getting a report to show data from specific time periods using date ranges in Business Central .

seg-source.mrk: Learn about getting a report to show data from specific time periods using date ranges in Business Central .

target.mrk: Zjistěte, jak získat přehled pro zobrazení dat z konkrétních časových období použitím rozsahu dat v Business Central.

trans-unit.source: Entering Date Ranges

seg-source.mrk: Entering Date Ranges

trans-unit.source: You can set filters containing a start date and an end date to display only the data contained in that date range or time interval.

seg-source.mrk: You can set filters containing a start date and an end date to display only the data contained in that date range or time interval.

target.mrk: Můžete nastavit filtry obsahující počáteční a konečné datum tak, aby zobrazovaly pouze data obsažená v daném rozsahu dat nebo časovém intervalu.

trans-unit.source: Special rules apply to the way you set date ranges.

seg-source.mrk: Special rules apply to the way you set date ranges.

target.mrk: Pro nastavení rozsahu dat platí zvláštní pravidla.

trans-unit.source: Let's take the **Customer Top 10** as an example:

seg-source.mrk: Let's take the **Customer Top 10** as an example:

trans-unit.source: Setting a date range in the request page for the Customer Top 10 list

seg-source.mrk: Setting a date range in the request page for the Customer Top 10 list

target.mrk: Nastavení rozsahu dat na stránce požadavku pro seznam 10 nejlepších zákazníků

trans-unit.source: Here you can limit the report to a date range such as the past 2 weeks, or a total of 6 weeks, or whatever range you want.

seg-source.mrk: Here you can limit the report to a date range such as the past 2 weeks, or a total of 6 weeks, or whatever range you want.

target.mrk: Zde můžete omezit přehled na rozsah dat, jako jsou například poslední 2 týdny nebo celkově 6 týdnů, nebo libovolné časové období.

trans-unit.source: To set date ranges, you enter dates and then use either **..**

seg-source.mrk: To set date ranges, you enter dates and then use either **..**

target.mrk: Chcete-li nastavit rozsah dat, zadejte data, a poté použijte buď **..**

trans-unit.source: or **|** to set the range.

seg-source.mrk: or **|** to set the range.

trans-unit.source: In our example, to show the top 10 customers for the first two weeks of May, you would set the date filter to *05 01 17..05 14 17*.

seg-source.mrk: In our example, to show the top 10 customers for the first two weeks of May, you would set the date filter to *05 01 17..05 14 17*.

target.mrk: V našem příkladu byste pro zobrazení prvních 10 zákazníků za první dva týdny v květnu nastavili filtr dat na *05 01 17..05 14 17*.

trans-unit.source: Here are a couple of other examples:

seg-source.mrk: Here are a couple of other examples:

trans-unit.source: Meaning

seg-source.mrk: Meaning

trans-unit.source: Example

seg-source.mrk: Example

trans-unit.source: Entries included

seg-source.mrk: Entries included

trans-unit.source: Equal to

seg-source.mrk: Equal to

trans-unit.source: Only those posted on December 15 2016.

seg-source.mrk: Only those posted on December 15 2016.

trans-unit.source: Interval

seg-source.mrk: Interval

trans-unit.source: Those posted on dates between and including December 15 2016 and January 15 2017.

seg-source.mrk: Those posted on dates between and including December 15 2016 and January 15 2017.

target.mrk: Zaúčtováno v termínech mezi a včetně 15. prosince 2016 a 15. ledna 2017.

trans-unit.source: Those posted on December 15 2016 or earlier.

seg-source.mrk: Those posted on December 15 2016 or earlier.

trans-unit.source: Either/or

seg-source.mrk: Either/or

trans-unit.source: Those posted on either December 15 or December 16 2016.

seg-source.mrk: Those posted on either December 15 or December 16 2016.

trans-unit.source: If there are entries posted on both days, they will all be displayed.

seg-source.mrk: If there are entries posted on both days, they will all be displayed.

target.mrk: Pokud jsou položky zaúčtované v obou dnech, zobrazí se všechny.

trans-unit.source: You can also combine the various format types.

seg-source.mrk: You can also combine the various format types.

target.mrk: Můžete také kombinovat různé typy formátů.

trans-unit.source: Example

seg-source.mrk: Example

trans-unit.source: Entries included

seg-source.mrk: Entries included

trans-unit.source: Entries posted either on December 15 2016 or on dates between and including December 01 2016 and May 31 2017.

seg-source.mrk: Entries posted either on December 15 2016 or on dates between and including December 01 2016 and May 31 2017.

target.mrk: Položky zaúčtované buď 15. prosince 2016, nebo v období mezi a včetně 1. prosince 2016 a 31. května 2017.

trans-unit.source: Entries posted on December 14 or earlier, or entries posted on December 30 or later - that is, all entries except those posted on dates between and including December 15 and 29.

seg-source.mrk: Entries posted on December 14 or earlier, or entries posted on December 30 or later - that is, all entries except those posted on dates between and including December 15 and 29.

target.mrk: Položky zaúčtované 14. prosince nebo dříve nebo položky zaúčtované 30. prosince nebo později - to značí všechny položky kromě těch, které byly zaúčtovány v termínech mezi a včetně 15. a 29. prosince.

trans-unit.source: Note that we have used the US date format MMDDYY here.

seg-source.mrk: Note that we have used the US date format MMDDYY here.

target.mrk: Upozorňujeme, že jsme zde použili US formát dat MMDDYY.

trans-unit.source: As [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] becomes available in other markets, you'll be able to use the formats that you are used to.

seg-source.mrk: As [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] becomes available in other markets, you'll be able to use the formats that you are used to.

target.mrk: Jakmile bude [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] k dispozici na jiných trzích, budete moci používat formáty, na které jste zvyklí.
